lead_paragraph: Morgan Stanley’s private bank is providing a line of credit to Mr. Cohen at a time when both his business and personal prospects look bright.

byline.contributor: Alexandra Stevenson and Chad Bray contributed reporting.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Provides Billionaire Steven Cohen With Loan Secured by Art
headline.print_headline: Morgan Stanley Arranged a Loan for Cohen, Backed by His Art Collection

abstract: Documents filed in Connecticut reveal Morgan Stanley approved personal loan for billionaire investor and art collector Steven A Cohen, which indicate Cohen may be interested in buying work of art; filing, combined with planned opening of his company Point72 Asset Management's London office, suggests Cohen has rebounded from pall cast on his reputation due to insider trading investigation of his former hedge fund SAC Capital Advisors.
